p: Peripheral blood samples were collected from all participants. Genomic DNA was extracted from peripheral blood leukocytes using standard phenol-chloroform procedures. Genotype for rs1338041 and rs61973742 was performed by polymerase chain reaction restriction fragment length polymorphism (PCR-RFLP) analysis. Two SNPs were all amplified using a forward mismatched primer that creates a restriction enzyme digestion site and the primer sequences and the PCR conditions of two SNPs are shown in Supplementary Table 1, in Supplementary Material available online at http://dx.doi.org/10.1155/2016/9281790. PCR products of the two SNPs were all digested with DraI (New England Biolabs, USA). The RFLP results were confirmed by direct sequencing of the PCR products.
